languages.text: "Охотно верю. Трон Вольного Торговца не терпит слабаков и идиотов".
"I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."
languages.original_text: "Охотно верю. Трон Вольного Торговца не терпит слабаков и идиотов".

traits.locale_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."
"I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

"I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."
"I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

languages.text: 「信じます。ローグトレーダーの玉座は、弱者や愚か者を許しませんから」
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

traits.locale_text: 「信じます。ローグトレーダーの玉座は、弱者や愚か者を許しませんから」

languages.text: "Das glaube ich gerne. Der Thron {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} duldet keine Schwächlinge oder Dummköpfe."
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

traits.locale_text: "Das glaube ich gerne. Der Thron {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} duldet keine Schwächlinge oder Dummköpfe."

languages.text: « Je vous crois. Le trône d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne peut être occupé par une personne faible ou stupide. »
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous crois. Le trône d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ne peut être occupé par une personne faible ou stupide. »

languages.text: «Le creo. En el trono de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente no hay lugar para débiles ni para necios».
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

traits.locale_text: «Le creo. En el trono de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente no hay lugar para débiles ni para necios».

languages.text: “我相信你的话，行商浪人的宝座从不会容忍弱者与白痴。”
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."

traits.locale_text: “我相信你的话，行商浪人的宝座从不会容忍弱者与白痴。”

languages.text: "Eminim görmüşsünüzdür. Hür Tacir'in tahtının, zayıflara ve aptallara tahammülü olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I believe you. A Rogue Trader's throne does not tolerate weaklings or idiots."
